Arizona Winter School 2013: Modular forms and modular curves

The 2013 AWS was held March 9-13, 2013 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Schedule and other important information
  • Organizers: Mirela Ciperiani and David Savitt (main program), Bryden Cais, Matthew Papanikolas, Rachel Pries, and Romyar Sharifi.
